Blaze follows Blacknightmare from a safe distance as much out of distrust as
respect,  She had wanted answers and right now the bot she was with was her
best chance to find them.
The tigress wasn't sure if she fit in but memory loss tended to make bots a
little paranoid. "Can I ask you your name?" she hesitated to ask remembering
the old saying about curiosity and the cat.

They entered the registration room, the consoles seemed the same as all the
others she'd seen on the ship. Blaze stepped closer to the console looking
at the controls. Being a yechnologies specialist meant she could figure out
almost any technology. She stood aside for Blacknightmare. the young female
bott didn't want to show off in front of the Predacon so she stood to the
side of the console to allow Blacknightmare room to access whatever she
needed.
::

"Well " said kindly the femme "We can find out that... Follow me"

While she walked to other register room "If you're in this base then,
you belong here" said Blacknightmare "We should check data bases and
regist you, I guess that you don't know who's the leader here?"
